name: MAGJohn (WMeng)
description:
Press "W, A, S, D " will control the South pole on different sides. Press "W, A, S, D " while holding "Shift" will extend the North Pole on the corresponding side.

Press "W" to extend the South Pole on top (Press "W" again to take back the South Pole )

Hold "Shift" and press "W" to switch to the North Pole on top (Press "W" again to take back the North Pole )

While sticking on some platforms, you can also press the direction keys, "left", "right" or "up" and "down" to control the movement of the platform.

Artist: Wang Mong, Peng Qingyuan

Programmer: Tianna Xu, ShenceMYX
